professional_summary: Senior Graphic Designer with expertise in Cross-Channel Marketing, Brand Creation & Reinvention, and 3D modeling/rendering. Proficient in multiple design software including 3dsMax, Maya, Softimage, and Adobe Creative Suite. Experienced in managing multiple projects and leading design teams while maintaining brand consistency and high visual communication standards.

work_experience.description: Lead 3D modeling and graphic design professional managing cross-channel marketing and brand consistency projects
responsibilities: Using 3dsMax, Maya, Softimage, Vray and Mental ray for 3D modeling and rendering
Managing 3D lighting and shaders with Vray and Mental ray
Performing detailed hard surface polygonal modeling for automotive, mechanical, product and architectural projects
Supervising and setting standards for graphic design team
Managing projects for major brands including McDonalds, Coca Cola, KFC, Jack Daniels, and others
Reviewing and enhancing team deliverables before client submission
Advanced visualization of packaging for best-selling brands
